DOC.brief_summary: Determine effect WelChol tablets serum lipid , lipoprotein , apolipoproteins , lipoprotein particle size patient stabilize pravastatin therapy least 4 week .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Determine Effect WelChol Tablets Cholesterol Patients Who Have Been Taking Pravastatin Least 4 Weeks .
DOC.criteria: Male female > = 18 year age On stable dose pravastatin LDLC > = 100 mg/dL < = 250 mg/dL Triglycerides < = 300 mg/dL Women pregnant breastfeeding planning become pregnant Women hysterectomy tubal ligation , postmenopausal practice accept method birth control specify protocol BMI > 40 kg/m2 History allergic toxic reaction colesevelam HCL History swallow disorder Any serious condition would interfere conduct study
